level.text: In addition to satisfying the educational requirements set forth in ยง 7602, an Applicant shall receive a passing score on the National Board Examination (“NBE”) developed and administered by the National Board for Respiratory Care (“NBRC”). The passing score for the NBE for purposes of these rules shall be the passing score determined by the NBRC.
Each Applicant for a license by examination shall submit to the Board a completed application and the Applicant’s NBE results, which shall be certified or validated by the NBRC.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7282 (September 17, 1999).
